1252:13: yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam |
1252:22: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād bhāvino'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ |
1252:34: yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvādvidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
1252:36: na hi dahanādinā dhūmādervyāptisādhakapramāṇādaparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtamasti |
1252:37: tasmādvidhyoreva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇamabhāvayorapi vyāptisādhakamiti nyāyasya duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ityanavadyo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
1252:38: tadayamakṣaṇikād vinivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartyaṃ kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirapyanavadyā |
1252:41: tathā hi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ,
1252:50: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulasādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānulambhaśca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt |
1252:54: api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
1252:64: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati,
1252:75: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ,
1252:81: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
1252:85: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryāditi cet |
1252:87: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt |
1252:93: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet |
1252:97: atrocyate | satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva |
1252:103: ye hi kāryamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye'nuvartamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate |
1252:105: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ |
1252:109: kiṃ ca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko'pyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
1252:113: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ |
1252:115: kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati |
1252:121: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu bruvatā vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati |
1252:122: na hi bhavati dhūmo vahnibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti |
1252:131: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikam |
1252:133: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ |
1252:136: kiṃ ca na bhūtalavadatrākṣaṇiko dharmī dṛśyate |
1252:137: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti |
1252:145: pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt,
1252:158: atha virodho'pi kālpanikaḥ na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti |
1252:161: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca |
1252:162: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā
1252:163: no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi || iti ||
1252:164: atrocyate | iha vastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
1252:167: avastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi |
1252:168: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti,
1252:181: tathā hyavastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastuni vidhīyate,
1252:187: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāditi kathamavastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ |
1252:189: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptastathāvastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ |
1252:191: tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmastadā'vastuno dharmitvasvīkāro'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ |
1252:192: atha na vyāpakadharmaḥ tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsaṃbhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ |
1252:194: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ parihartumiti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ |
1252:195: avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet |
1252:197: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsartumicchati |
1252:198: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣeddhaṃ śakyate |
1252:199: tataśvātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate |
1252:207: svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgādityakṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe'pi vā vastudharmeṇa dharmitvamavyāhatamiti nāyamāśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
1252:218: na hyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ |
1252:221: iṣyate ca taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhādityakāmakenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho'kṣaṇika svīkartavya iti nāyamapratītatvādapyāśrayāsiddho heturvaktavyaḥ |
1252:223: na kaściddheturanāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāditi tadasaṅgatam |
1252:224: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra saṃbhave'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt |
1252:240: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryaṃ kuryāt,
1252:244: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti,
1252:246: yadā tāvadamī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu,
1252:248: militaireva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate |
1252:253: dṛśyatām, kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat |
1252:254: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati |
1252:257: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryam |
1252:260: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantarama,
1252:263: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam |
1252:268: na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo'pekṣata iti yuktam,
1252:270: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti,
1252:273: yaccoktam-yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt,
1252:276: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti tadasaṅgatam |
1252:277: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat |
1252:279: kiṃ kurmaḥ, uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet |
1252:281: sthiratve'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet |
1252:286: kāryeniṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet |
1252:288: sāmagrīsaṃbhavāsaṃbhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasaṃbhave janakatvamavāryamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt |
1252:289: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati |
1252:291: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasaṃbhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt |
1252:296: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo'dṛśyatve'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati |
1252:297: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptamiti kramākramayoranyonyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ |
1252:306: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratipattiḥ |
1252:309: tadayaṃ vyāpakānupalambho'kṣaṇikasyāsattvam sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ va sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāditi sthitam ||
1252:310: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvamavastutvāt |
1252:314: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayākevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhirvṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ |
1252:315: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhireva rśiśapāyā abhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
1252:316: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇādeva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ |
1252:317: artha kriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītirevārthakriyā'yogapratītiriti vyāpakānupalambhāntarādasya na kaścidviśeṣaḥ ||
1252:318: adhyavasāyāpekṣayā va bāhye'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ |
1252:324: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathāvastubhūte'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ |
1252:326: yathā ca hariṇaśirasi tenaikajñānasaṃsargi śṛṅgamupalabdhaṃ śaśaśirasyapi tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasaṃbhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
1252:327: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdhamekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
1252:329: nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti saṃbhāvanayā ekajñānasaṃsargadvārakameva pratiṣidhyate |
1252:330: kathaṃ punaretasminnityajñāne kramākramayorasphuraṇamiti yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet |
1252:331: ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropa mantareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt |
1252:334: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthiti lakṣaṇatayā durvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ anantarbhāvācca śuddhanityavikalpena dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa kathamullekhaḥ |
1252:335: tataśca pratiyogini nitye'pi vikalpyamāne ekajñāna saṃsargilakṣaṇaprāpte nityopalabdhireva nityaviruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ |
1252:338: na tvetadavastu dharmitvopayogivastva dhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet |
1252:347: tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya kramākramavadbāhyanityopādānaśūnyatvenārthakriyāvad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatve prasādhanāt |
1252:349: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ |
1252:350: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādirantarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyamiti trilocano'pi nirastaḥ ||
1252:359: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhanāt pratyakṣādanumānādekasmādvā pramāṇāntarāt siddhamiti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ |
1252:360: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt |
1252:361: vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca |
1252:365: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmo heturavastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ |
1252:368: vikalpollikhita ścāsya svabhāvo nāpara ityapi vyavahartavyam |
1252:372: ato yathā pramāṇābhāve'pi vikalpasiddhasya bandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho'nurūpastathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tata eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt |
1252:373: yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvād virodhapratiṣedhastarhi bandhyāputrādyanubhavābhāvādeva saundaryādiniṣedho'pi mā bhūt ||
1252:376: na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcidubhayakoṭidattapādasaṃbandhābhidhānamiṣyate asmābhirūpapadyate vā yenaikasaṃbandhino vastutvābhāve'pāramārthikaṃ syāt |
1252:381: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo'yamanayorasaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ |
1252:385: nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma,
1252:388: na hi dharmāntarasya saṃbhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ |
1252:390: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasaṃbhave'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasaṃbhavaḥ |
1252:391: viruddhauceddhamau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ kimapareṇa pratijñāmātrasiddhena virodhanāmnā vastvantareṇa |
1252:394: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca |
1252:395: śanyaśya dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattā'pi sattā yathā
1252:396: no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi || iti ||
1252:404: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikānnivartamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyattena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiravirodhinī ||
